clinical_study.brief_title: Implementation and Evaluation of a Social Journey Accompanied in Breast Cancer Diagnosis (EPARS SEIN)
clinical_study.official_title: Implementation and Evaluation of a Social Journey Accompanied for Women With Breast Cancer Diagnosis

lead_sponsor.agency: Institut du Cancer de Montpellier - Val d'Aurelle

clinical_study.source: Institut du Cancer de Montpellier - Val d'Aurelle

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluate and compare the return to work rate at 12 months

detailed_description.textblock: Evaluate and compare the return to work rate at 12 months (from J1C1 [first day of the first adjuvant chemotherapy regimen]) between the "intervention" group (which has accompanied the career) and the standard group course

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate and compare the return to work rate
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 5 years
primary_outcome.description: Evaluate and compare the return to work rate at 12 months (from J1C1 [first day of the first adjuvant chemotherapy regimen]) between the "intervention" group (which has accompanied the career) and the standard group course

secondary_outcome.measure: describe the conditions of the resumption of work
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 5 years
secondary_outcome.description: The study will also allow to describe the conditions of the resumption of work in 12 months for the patients concerned and to compare these conditions between the 2 groups

arm_group.description: Personalized coaching coordinated by a coordinating nurse on a shutdown period of 8 months (consecutive stops).

intervention.description: personalized coaching coordinated by a coordinating nurse on a shutdown period of 8 months (consecutive stops).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patient major> 18
- Have a diagnosis of localized breast cancer requiring surgery immediately adjuvant therapy sequence including chemotherapy and radiotherapy
- Being more than 3 years of retirement at diagnosis
- Have a work contract valid at the time of diagnosis (before surgery)
- Do not practice a profession
- Be in possession of his rights (excluding guardianship, curatorship)
- Raise the general social security scheme and have rights to cash benefits in the Languedoc-Roussillon region
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient minor
- Patient diagnosed with metastatic breast cancer
- Patients refusing to sign the consent
- Patients do not have sufficient understanding of the French language
- Patients for whom it is impossible to give clear information
